text: Bernard Thomas (August 22, 1948 â€“ June 16, 2019), better known as Bishop Bullwinkle, was an American singer and comedian. He was best known for appearing in the viral YouTube video "Hell 2 Da Naw Naw". By July 22, 2015, the video went viral and got over 200,000 views with over 4,000 likes.Pulse Nigeria, 07.08.2015 - Hell 2 Da Naw Naw, Pastor's music sermon goes viral on YouTube (VIDEO) Oge Okonkwo As of January 17, 2019, a video of the song attracted over 32 million views and 236,000 likes.YouTube - Bishop Bullwinkle Hell To Da Naw,Naw,Naw With Da Bicycle He was born in Tampa, Florida. His name was inspired by the cartoon character Bullwinkle the Moose.Plant City Observer, Friday, Oct 2, 2015 - News, P.C. man enjoys fame from viral music video by: Justin Kline - CHECK IT OUT Bullwinkle died in Plant City, Florida from a heart attack on June 16, 2019 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Comedians from Florida Category:Singers from Tampa, Florida
title: Bishop Bullwinkle
